c:complexType.name: NumberFormat
c:complexType.c:documentation:
The options documentation of the number format.
A number format formats numbers by using a formatting mask. The mask syntax is mostly compatible with VB's format() function mask syntax. See for more information on the mask syntax (only the number related subset is relevant).
See for more information on inheritance of formatting configurations.

c:property.name: style
c:property.c:documentation: The number format style to use.
